summary: VIBRATION IN FRONT WHEEL, DIAGNOSED AT DEALERSHIP THAT THE TIRE HAS A SHIFTED BELT.  THIS TIRE IS ON THE DRIVER'S SIDE.  WE ALREADY REPLACED THE PASSENGER SIDE FRONT TIRE 2/13/19. THIS IS A DUALLY TRUCK AND WE ARE CONCERNED THAT THIS WILL ALSO HAPPEN TO THE 4 REAR TIRES. THE VEHICLE CURRENTLY ONLY HAS 21,390 MILES.  THIS SHOULD NOT BE OCCURRING AND IS A SAFETY HAZARD. I TRIED TO CONTACT THE MANUFACTURER BUT THEY HAVE NOT RETURNED MY CALLS.
